name: Basalt
introduction: Jaw crushers are mostly used in primary cruhsing, crushign raw stones & rocks to small ones. It can aslso used in tertiary crushing. it depends on the models. SBM design & produce series of jaw crusher and they well meet customers' different requirements.
flow:
• The basalt stones of various sizes are fed into the jaw crushers for size reduction.
  • Next, depending on the desired output size of the crushed stone, the raw material may be fed to one or two jaw crushers in a sequence. Then these crushed stones re passed on to the rotary screen for size gradation. Last, material is handled through a belt conveyor to the different places of operation i.e from jaw crusher to the rotary screen.
